filter.name: audio_described
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are audio-described

option.title: filter for programmes that are audio-described
filter for programmes that are not audio-described

filter.name: availability
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have availability

option.title: filter for programmes that are expected to become available imminently

filter.name: availability
filter.title: filter for programmes that will become available within given duration

filter.name: availability_from
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are available after or at the specified datetime

filter.name: availability_to
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are available before the specified datetime

filter.name: children_of
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as immediate parent

filter.name: descendants_of
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as ancestor

filter.name: duration
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have given duration

option.title: filter for programmes that have short duration (< 5m)
filter for programmes that have medium duration (5m - 30m)
filter for programmes that have long duration (> 30m)

filter.name: entity_type
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have given entity type

option.title: filter for programmes that are brands
filter for programmes that are series
filter for programmes that are episodes

filter.name: format
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with format

filter.name: genre
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with genre

filter.name: group
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes which belong to the given group pid

filter.name: initial_letter
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter librarian style (ignoring leading 'The', 'An' (Welsh), etc) 0-9 a-z

filter.name: initial_letter_end
filter.title: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/before given letter. Use with initial_letter_start for a range

filter.name: initial_letter_start
filter.title: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/after given letter. Use with initial_letter_end for range.

filter.name: initial_letter_stop
filter.title: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/before given letter. Use with initial_letter_start for a range

filter.name: initial_letter_strict
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter

filter.name: item
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with linked to versions which have the given item pids

filter.name: master_brand
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with master_brand

filter.name: media_set
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with media set

filter.name: partner_id
filter.title: filter for programmes by partner ID

filter.name: partner_pid
filter.title: filter for programmes by partner PID

filter.name: people
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with contributions by given people PID

filter.name: pid
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes having given PID

filter.name: promoted_for
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes which are promoted for given service

filter.name: q
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

filter.name: signed
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are signed

option.title: filter for programmes that are signed
filter for programmes regardless of signedness
filter for programmes that are not signed

filter.name: tag_name
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with tag

filter.name: tag_scheme
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with a tag

filter.name: tleo
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are TLEOs

option.title: filter for programmes that are TLEOs
filter for programmes that are not TLEOs

filter.name: version
filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with given PID as one of their versions

sort.name: group_position
sort.title: sort numerically by position in group, ascending

sort.name: most_popular
sort.title: sort numerically by popularity (most popular first)

sort.name: release_date
sort.title: sort chronologically by release date, descending

sort.name: relevance
sort.title: sort by weighting of search term (use with q parameter)

sort.name: scheduled_start
sort.title: sort chronologically by scheduled start time/date, ascending

sort.name: title
sort.title: sort by title librarian style (ignoring leading 'The', 'A', etc), ascending

sort.name: tree
sort.title: sort by root pid and then preorder tree sort. Requires entities to have release date.

sort.name: views
sort.title: sort numerically by number of views (most popular first - faster most_popular)

mixin.name: contributions
mixin.title: mixin to return information about contributors to a programme

mixin.name: duration
mixin.title: mixin to return original version duration in programme concept entities

mixin.name: genre_groupings
mixin.title: mixin to return list of genre groupings

mixin.name: genre_groups
mixin.title: mixin to return list of genre groups

mixin.name: images
mixin.title: mixin to add image information for a programme

mixin.name: is_embeddable
mixin.title: mixin to add embeddable information for a programme

mixin.name: people
mixin.title: mixin to return information about contributors to a programme

mixin.name: related_links
mixin.title: mixin to return information about related links to a programme

mixin.name: titles
mixin.title: mixin to return ancestor programme titles
